casebody.data:
Raanol BELLARD v. Charles CASTILLE, Susan Castille and Shelter Insurance Companies. No. 2000-C-0071. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Feb. 25, 2000.

Prior report: La.App.,-So.2d-.

In re Castille, Charles et al.; — Defendant; applying for writ of certiorari and/or review, Parish of Lafayette, 15th Judicial District Court Div. M, Nos. 96-5079; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No. 99-1161.

Denied.

MARCUS, J., not on panel.
